name: Shootball!
description:
Split-screen soccer with guns! Push the ball into the goal using the force of your bullets. This game only works for local multiplayer. 

You can either use computer and a controller to play, or two controllers.

Controls for keyboard and mouse:   WASD - movement, SPACE - jump, LMB - shoot

Controls for controllers:   Left stick for movement,  bottom button (A) to jump,      Right trigger or left button (X) to shoot.
